SessionStart.command: echo '--- Session Start ---' && echo "Branch: $(git branch --show-current)" && git status --short && echo '---' && if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then echo 'Installing dependencies...' && npm install 2>&1 || echo 'Warning: npm install failed. You can still read files and debug.'; else echo 'Dependencies ready.'; fi && echo '--- Ready ---'

PostToolUse.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_NAME" | grep -qE '^(Write|Edit)$'; then FILE="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [ -n "$FILE" ] && [ -f "$FILE" ]; then npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.js$'; then npx eslint --fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi; fi; fi
